title: MD
biography: Loveyapa is a 2025 Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy film directed by Advait Chandan. A remake of the 2022 Tamil film Love Today, it stars Khushi Kapoor and Junaid Khan. It tells the story of a young couple who are forced to swap their phones before getting married.
aiSummary: Anupam Sachdeva is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 20 at Pediatric hematology (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Hematology/Oncology and Stem Cell Therapy, BMJ Case Reports. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
